views.markdown:
- iOS 12.4 fixes - Fix crash on iOS 11
- Various methods for enhanced safe usage when Amplifying
- To make sure you don't amplify un-intentionally it will ask you to "Reclick the + button" to start the amplifier.
- Will play a short haptic feedback warning to notify when "Reclick" is needed.
- If you are in "Amplified Mode" and you click the + button while the Volume Hud is not display, you will need to click + again to amplify it.


- iOS 12 Support
- Bug fixes
- The app will Respring after activation. it's ok. it's part of the activation process.
Trying to fix the SpringBoard crash

iOS 10 Support added
Crash Fixes v1.70

iOS 9 Support
- Support for iOS 8.3/8.4
- Crash fixes
- Crash fixes
- Much faster algorithm
- Better volume boost algorithm

- Crash fixes
- Noise fix
- Crash fixes
- Volume changes
- Fixed need to re-activate after reboot

- Added iOS 8.1.1 Support

- Automatically retrieve activation code after purchase (just re-open app after a few minutes)

- Fixed app icon not showing

- iOS 8 Support
- iPhone 6/6+ Support
- Fixed crash in activation

- Fixed iOS 6 Icon
- Fixed a bug in activation screen
- Fixed volume in some applications

- Supports iOS 7.1.2
- Fixed a few bugs
- Fixed not working on some devices

- Fix missing dependency
- Restart bug fixes
- Various bug fixes
- Removed "Activator" dependency (should be installed separately).
- Few bug fixes.

- Added iPhone 5C / 5S Support
- Better iOS 7 Support

Added iOS 7 Support
Minor bug fixes
- Added Tons of translations (Chinese, French, Hebrew, Arabic, Hungarian, Russian, Greek, Romanian, ..)
- Another try at fixing the lock screen freeze
- Fix: Better memory handling.
- Fix: Blank screen on unlock.
- Fix: Sometimes not working after reboot

- Now amplifies EVERYTHING ! now you can amplify your iPod music, VOIP calls (such as Viber & Skype), Radio players, Ringer and much more.
- On iPhone 4S it only amplifies audio that comes out of the external speaker.

- Added support for iPhone 4S.
- iPhone 4 & 3GS won't be supported because of technical issues. ever. sorry.

- Added logs to better debug problems on some devices
- Fixed freezing on lock screen on some devices
- Fixed small memory leak
